name: left
description: Returns the substring that extracts *length* chars from *string* starting from the left.

params.name: string
params.description: The string from which to return a substring.

params.name: length
params.description: The number of characters to return.

params.name: string
params.description: The string from which to return a substring.

params.name: length
params.description: The number of characters to return.

examples:
FROM employees
| KEEP last_name
| EVAL left = LEFT(last_name, 3)
